blogData.title: Happy Holidays from VideoTranslator!
blogData.description: Thank you for all your support
blogData.keywords: Christmas, Holidays, New Year, '2019', '2020', thank you, success, VideoTranslator, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
What a year it’s been! From our launch in May we would not have believed we’d come so far in such a short amount of time.

Thank You

Thank you everyone for all your support! We want to wish you and yours a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. We hope you have a brilliant 2020!

Everyone who engaged with us, others that offered feedback, and folks who made a purchasing decision - thank you very much.

Thank you to everyone whose time, thoughts and work touched our lives. We hope that your holiday season is joyful and surrounded by friends, family and good cheer, and next year is filled with wins.

See you in the new year,

Team VideoTranslator

Winning In 2020!

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform, or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

nodes.title: What Team VT Is Planning In 2022!
nodes.description: Happy New Year 2022, the feeling around the office is that a pretty messy 2021 is done, and we are looking forward optimistically to 2022. Today we are going to talk about our plans for 2022!
nodes.coverAlt: What Team VT Is Planning In 2022!

nodes.description: Find out how you can transcribe your audio using VideoTranslator, Microsoft Word and Google Docs, plus tips to get an accurate transcription.
